item.title: Omdena
item.description: My Experience with Omdena Inc. Assalamualikum everyone, I have completed an 8-week NLP project with Omdena very recently. This post is intended to get folks to know about the platform and my experience throughout the journey. I am going to break down the post into 4 major parts giving answers to 4 frequently asked questions to anyone who worked with Omdena. What is Omdena Inc.? Omdena is a bottom-up collaborative platform to build AI.
